test.post-deploy: npm set progress=false && npm update && grunt pm2 --deployEnvironment test && grunt build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.json --env test && pm2 stop all && sleep 1 && pm2 restart master && pm2 restart history-server-1 && pm2 restart chat-server-1 && pm2 restart chat-server-2 && sleep 1 && pm2 restart connector-server-1 && pm2 restart connector-server-2 && pm2 restart web

production.post-deploy: npm set progress=false && npm update & grunt pm2 --deployEnvironment production && grunt build --uglify true && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.json --env production && pm2 stop all && sleep 1 && pm2 restart master && pm2 restart history-server-1 && pm2 restart chat-server-1 && pm2 restart chat-server-2 && sleep 1 && pm2 restart connector-server-1 && pm2 restart connector-server-2 && pm2 restart web
